Managing Partner at VertiGO Solutions, a DC based mobile phone recycling and telecom advisory firm active in commercial and military markets. Developed the first secure mobile phone recycling and data destruction product to meet the military’s rigorous DISA standard.

Frequent speaker about the mobile economy as well as how leadership and business governance in mobility is a model for creating new opportunities and process transformation. Through my career, I have served in various advisory and board roles for several successful technology companies in the telecommunications, financial, health care, media and manufacturing markets including Motorola and Nokia.
